mapper.insert: insert into tb_file (FILE_SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_FULL_PATH, USE_TYPE, USE_YN, SORT, PARAM1, PARAM2, PARAM3, PARAM4, PARAM5, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME) values (#{fileSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tb_file
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_FULL_PATH = #{fileFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_file set FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_FULL_PATH = #{fileFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from tb_file where USE_YN = '1' and USE_TYPE = '10'
mapper.delete: update tb_file set USE_YN = '0' where USE_TYPE = '10' and SORT = #{sort}
